Sentencas: The combination of biomass gasification and fuel cell is a promising way to enhance the system energy efficiency and decrease the fossil fuel consumption.
Titulo: Comprehensive performance assessment of a novel biomass-based CCHP system integrated with SOFC and HT-PEMFC

Sentencas: In this study, a new biomass-based combined cooling, heating and power (CCHP) system considering high temperature proton exchange membrane fuel cell (HT-PEMFC) and solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is proposed.
Titulo: Comprehensive performance assessment of a novel biomass-based CCHP system integrated with SOFC and HT-PEMFC

Sentencas: Syngas from biomass gasifier is utilized by SOFC and HT-PEMFC for power generation, waste heat derived from SOFC and HT-PEMFC are recovered by ORC and absorption chiller for electricity and cooling production, respectively.
Titulo: Comprehensive performance assessment of a novel biomass-based CCHP system integrated with SOFC and HT-PEMFC

Sentencas: Energetic, exergetic, economic and environmental investigations are performed to illustrate system comprehensive performances.
Titulo: Comprehensive performance assessment of a novel biomass-based CCHP system integrated with SOFC and HT-PEMFC

Sentencas: The results demonstrated that power generation ratio of SOFC to HT-PEMFC is 2.32, exergy and energy efficiency of CCHP system are 25.06% and 49.48%, respectively.
Titulo: Comprehensive performance assessment of a novel biomass-based CCHP system integrated with SOFC and HT-PEMFC

Sentencas: Levelized cost of production and CO2 emission rate of multi-products are 0.069$/(kW & sdot;h) and 0.673kg/(kW & sdot;h), respectively.
Titulo: Comprehensive performance assessment of a novel biomass-based CCHP system integrated with SOFC and HT-PEMFC

Sentencas: Moreover, steam to biomass ratio and equivalent ratio show different effects on system performances due to the distinction of syngas composition.
Titulo: Comprehensive performance assessment of a novel biomass-based CCHP system integrated with SOFC and HT-PEMFC

Sentencas: Operating temperature of SOFC has a great influence on system exergy and energy efficiency, with increasing by 11.18% and 16.97% respectively.
Titulo: Comprehensive performance assessment of a novel biomass-based CCHP system integrated with SOFC and HT-PEMFC

Sentencas: In general, this novel system provides a new pathway for integrating biomass with different fuel cell technologies.
Titulo: Comprehensive performance assessment of a novel biomass-based CCHP system integrated with SOFC and HT-PEMFC
